scripts.build: yarn run build-win && yarn run build-linux && yarn run build-mac
scripts.build-win: cpy ./executables/ollama.exe ./build/win && esbuild ./src/index.ts --bundle --target=node18 --outfile=./dist/morpheus.cjs --platform=node && pkg ./dist/morpheus.cjs --out-path=./build/win --targets latest-win --compress GZip --verbose && zip-build ./build/win ./build --template=%NAME%_v%VERSION%_win.%EXT% --format=zip
scripts.build-linux: cpy ./executables/ollama-linux ./build/linux && esbuild ./src/index.ts --bundle --target=node18 --outfile=./dist/morpheus.cjs --platform=node && pkg ./dist/morpheus.cjs --out-path=./build/linux --targets latest-linux --compress GZip --verbose && zip-build ./build/linux ./build --template=%NAME%_v%VERSION%_linux.%EXT% --format=tar
scripts.build-mac: cpy ./executables/ollama-darwin ./build/darwin && esbuild ./src/index.ts --bundle --target=node18 --outfile=./dist/morpheus.cjs --platform=node && pkg ./dist/morpheus.cjs --out-path=./build/darwin --targets latest-mac --compress GZip --verbose && zip-build ./build/darwin ./build --template=%NAME%_v%VERSION%_mac.%EXT% --format=zip
